cyclone.name: HARVEY
cyclone.current_location: about 115 miles (185 km) SE of Corpus Christi, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest toward the middle Texas coast, then forecast to meander near or just inland of the Texas coast through the weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: middle Texas coast near Port O’Connor/Corpus Christi

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm-surge and tropical‐storm watches south of Port Mansfield TX to the Mouth of the Rio Grande
weather_observation.warning_coast: Storm-surge warning Port Mansfield to High Island TX; Hurricane warning Port Mansfield to Sargent TX; Tropical-storm warning north of Sargent to High Island TX
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Texas coast from Port Mansfield to High Island and adjacent Gulf waters, with effects extending into southwestern Louisiana
